statements: SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory;
SELECT id, livestock_type, quantity FROM livestock_inventory ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT livestock_type, quantity FROM livestock_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, livestock_type FROM livestock_inventory WHERE livestock_type = 'cows';
SELECT DISTINCT livestock_type FROM livestock_inventory;
SELECT id, livestock_type, quantity, time_stamp FROM livestock_inventory ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY livestock_type ASC;
SELECT livestock_type, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM livestock_inventory GROUP BY livestock_type HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM livestock_inventory;
SELECT DISTINCT livestock_type FROM livestock_inventory ORDER BY livestock_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory;
SELECT id, inventory_name, quantity FROM livestock_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, change_type, change_amount, change_timestamp FROM inventory_changes WHERE change_type = 'add';
SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, inventory_name, quantity, timestamp FROM livestock_inventory WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT inventory_name, quantity FROM livestock_inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM livestock_inventory;

SELECT inventory_name, change_amount, change_timestamp FROM livestock_inventory JOIN inventory_changes ON livestock_inventory.id = inventory_changes.inventory_id WHERE inventory_changes.change_type='add' AND inventory_changes.change_amount > 5 ORDER BY change_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT change_type FROM inventory_changes;
SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory;
SELECT livestock_type, quantity FROM livestock_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, livestock_type, date_recorded FROM livestock_inventory WHERE livestock_type = 'Cow';
SELECT * FROM inventory_changes WHERE quantity_changed < 0 ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM inventory_locations ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT * FROM livestock_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, livestock_type, quantity FROM livestock_inventory WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT change_type, quantity_changed, change_date FROM inventory_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM inventory_locations WHERE location_name ILIKE '%Farm%' ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT inventory_id, livestock_type, quantity, date_recorded FROM livestock_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND livestock_type = 'Cattle' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockInventory;
SELECT livestock_name, inventory_quantity FROM LivestockInventory WHERE inventory_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT type_name, type_description FROM LivestockTypes ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, log_date, log_action FROM InventoryLogs WHERE log_action = 'added' AND inventory_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM LivestockInventory WHERE inventory_quantity > 100 ORDER BY inventory_date DESC;
SELECT livestock_name, inventory_quantity FROM LivestockInventory WHERE livestock_name LIKE 'C%' AND inventory_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM LivestockInventory JOIN LivestockTypes ON LivestockInventory.id = LivestockTypes.type_id GROUP BY type_name HAVING total_quantity > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, old_quantity, new_quantity FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, inventory_id, log_date, log_action FROM InventoryLogs WHERE log_action = 'updated' OR log_action = 'deleted';
SELECT * FROM LivestockInventory;
SELECT livestock_type, quantity FROM LivestockInventory ORDER BY inventory_date DESC;
SELECT id, change_type, change_amount FROM InventoryChanges WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LivestockInventory WHERE livestock_type = 'Cow' AND quantity > 10;
SELECT username FROM InventoryUsers WHERE password = 'securePassword';
SELECT * FROM LivestockInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY inventory_date DESC;
SELECT id, livestock_type FROM LivestockInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, inventory_date FROM LivestockInventory GROUP BY inventory_date ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT LivestockInventory.*, InventoryChanges.change_type FROM LivestockInventory INNER JOIN InventoryChanges ON LivestockInventory.id = InventoryChanges.livestock_id;
SELECT LivestockTypes.type_name, LivestockInventory.quantity FROM LivestockTypes JOIN LivestockInventory ON LivestockTypes.id = LivestockInventory.id ORDER BY quantity DESC;
